name: a simple affair
notes:
find kits for the larger version [here][1].
find kits for the smaller, red version [here][2].

a simple affair is the perfect project for when you want easy, meditative knitting that still results in a beautiful, wearable piece. with relaxing garter stitch sections accented by simple eyelets and finished with a twisted rib border, this shawl is both elegant and simple to make. it’s designed with two size options based on gauge, giving you flexibility while keeping the instructions straightforward. the heart-shaped design offers a generous wingspan without too much depth, making it effortless to wrap and style.

**sizes**

lace + lace (fingering + lace)

**finished dimensions**

wingspan: 76 (83)“ / 193 (211) cm
center depth: 23 (25)“ / 58.5 (63.5) cm

**yarn**

lace + lace version

sonder yarn co. haven (75% falkland merino, 12.5% bluefaced leicester, 12.5% masham); 711 yds (650m) / 100g
1 skein - shown in ‘an affair to remember'
or approximately 711 y (650 m) of a similar laceweight yarn.

sonder yarn co. halo (72% mohair, 28% silk); 459 yds (420m) / 50g
2 skeins, shown in 'siren'
or approximately 711 yds (650 m) of fluffy lace weight yarn

fingering + lace version

sonder yarn co. sunday morning 4 ply (75% bluefaced leicester,
25% masham); 432 yds (395m) / 100g
2 skeins - shown in ‘dirty weekend'
or approximately 760 yds (695 m) of a similar fingering weight yarn.

sonder yarn co. halo (72% mohair, 28% silk); 459 yds (420m) / 50g
2 skeins, shown in 'dirty weekend'
or approximately 760 yds (695 m) of fluffy lace weight yarn

**gauge**

19 (17) sts & 33 (30) rows per 4”/10cm measured in garter stitch after blocking. to save time and ensure accurate measurements, be sure to swatch and use the needle size required to achieve gauge.
